entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 30 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
